thread.title: Right to Dream Academy present trophies to GFA Executive Committee after successful European tour
thread.title_full: Right to Dream Academy present trophies to GFA Executive Committee after successful European tour

title: Right to Dream Academy present trophies to GFA Executive Committee after successful European tour
text:
15:55 CET Right to Dream Academy present trophies to GFA Executive Committee after successful European tour - www.ghanasoccernet.com Right to Dream Academy present trophies to GFA Executive Committee 
The U17 team of the Right to Dream Academy have presented the five trophies they won in the summer tournaments in Europe to the Ghana FA's Executive Committee on Monday. 
The team from Right to Dream led by their CEO Tom Vernon and Director of Partnerships James Meller were received by the President of the Ghana FA Kwesi Nyantakyi to their Executive Committee meeting. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
